author: Eep
title: OK but could use some tweaks
review:
I like yet another construction themed set (my first official one after already owning 4202 Mining Truck). I like the wheelbarrow and the rat is cute but unsure of its relevancy to the set/theme.

 

The set is an easy build but I have some issues with it:

  • Needs clips/grips to hold shovel, road construction sign, and wheelbarrow.
  • Orange safety/traffic 2x2 cones (nose cone 2x2x2 + plate 2x2) are way too big; should be 1x1 nose cone + 1x1 plate as in 75909 McLaren P1.
  • Truck bed should be behind cab to not block driver's view when full.
  • Too many 2x4 bricks that remove details like lights (brake/tail, head/front).
  • Waggon bottom 4x10 (66118) is way too big of a piece that unnecessarily removes details and makes the vehicle look blocky.

 

For $9.99 retail (I got it for $7.99 at Target), I would like to have more parts to give more details (clips/grips, lights) as described above.

author: Puidwen
title: A very nice set
review: So far all of the learn to build set mini-figs have excellent printing.  This set isn't an an exception.  I appreciated the inclusion of some "rubble in this set".  The tractor doesn't look too "kiddy" and in fact has some rather nice parts.  I will say that one fault, with set is that if your not careful the roll-over cage tends to come off.
